title: Chronometric Age
description: The age of a specimen or related materials that is generated from a dating assay. This is a categorical term (class) to organize the other chronometric age properties and does not ever have values.

properties.name: chronometricAgeProtocol
properties.description: A description of or reference to the methods used to determine the ChronometricAge.

properties.name: chronometricAgeRemarks
properties.description: Notes or comments about the ChronometricAge.

properties.name: chronometricAgeUncertaintyInYears
properties.description: The temporal uncertainty of the earliestChronometricAge and latestChronometicAge in years.

properties.name: earliestChronometricAge
properties.description: The maximum/earliest/oldest possible age of a specimen as determined by a dating method.

properties.name: earliestChronometricAgeReferenceSystem
properties.description: The reference system associated with the earliestChronometricAge.

properties.name: hasIdentifier
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Identifier class.

properties.name: hasMeasurementOrFact
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the MeasurementOrFact class.

properties.name: hasReference
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Reference class.

properties.name: latestChronometricAge
properties.description: The minimum/latest/youngest possible age of a specimen as determined by a dating method.

properties.name: latestChronometricAgeReferenceSystem
properties.description: The reference system associated with the latestChronometricAge.

properties.name: verbatimChronometricAge
properties.description: The verbatim age for a specimen, whether reported by a dating assay, associated references, or legacy information.
